channel.title: Zombies for two on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Zombies for two on Game6r

item.title: Pixel Apocalypse: New Adventure
item.description: After the appearance of an unknown virus, the cities of Japan were filled with bloodthirsty monsters. The army cannot cope with the hordes of the dead, the country’s leadership turned to you with a request for help. Go to the most dangerous areas of the metropolis, destroy monsters and destroy their nests. In this game you can play together with your friend, erasing twice as many zombies from the face of the earth and covering each other from enemy attacks.
